cast.name: 查尔斯·卡维尔 Charles Carver
马克斯·卡维尔 Max Carver

introduction: 2 young adult twins, Andrew and Elliot Blooms, who learn of one another's existence upon the murder of their father. In turn, they inherit a hand-crafted secret criminal empire he's left them, with many strings attached. The immorality, corruption and debauchery of their father's world is deep, and every time they think they've reached the bottom it gets worse. The young men are inexperienced but not innocent, vastly different but in many ways exactly the same, with each missing something in his life that only the other can supply.
